name: Car Shopping Agent
description: This agent helps users shop for cars by connecting them with dealers and facilitating purchases

skills.name: Car Shopping Tool
skills.description: Helps users shop for cars by connecting with dealers, getting quotes, and facilitating purchases based on their preferences.
examples: I'm looking for a new compact SUV between $25,000 and $30,000
Find me a used sedan under $25,000
I want to buy a car
Help me purchase a Toyota Camry
Connect me with a dealer for this car
